level.heading: CERTIFICATION REQUIRED PRIOR TO PROVIDING LOCAL EXCHANGE SERVICE (ยง 15-2501) No party shall provide local exchange service to the public in the District ofolumbia, regardless of the facilities used, without first receivingertification from the Commission to provide such service.
SOURCE
level.text: Notice of Final Rulemaking published at 47 DCR 2601(April 14, 2000).
